column2: Your loyal vassal, [From.GetFullName], has sent you a courier with an offer. [From.GetSheHeCap] is willing to make a significant donation to your War Chest, but in return you must promise to return the favor in the future. A most generous offer!
[From.GetFullName] has decided to accept your donation offer! Now we have leverage on [From.GetHerHim], we must make sure to use it wisely.
[From.GetFullName] has refused your generous donation offer. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that you are just trying to gain leverage on [From.GetHerHim], outrageous!
This is just what we need!
[From.GetSheHeCap] is just trying to gain leverage on me! I refuse.
A generous donation from a good friend!
